TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpRequestMessageProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty
Public NotInheritable Class HttpRequestMessageProperty Implements IMessageProperty

summary.span: 提供对 HTTP 请求的访问，以访问和响应通过 HTTP 协议提供给请求的附加信息。

span.span: Provides access to the HTTP request to access and respond to the additional information made available for requests over the HTTP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是允许开发人员直接访问 HTTP 请求信息的常规用途类，该类可用于包装特定于 HTTP 的信息。This is a general-purpose class that gives the developer direct access to the HTTP request information, which can be used for encapsulating HTTP-specific information. 此类的一个示例用途是支持根据“具象状态传输”(REST) 体系结构实现的服务。One example of the use of this class is to support services implemented in accordance with the Representational State Transfer (REST) architecture. 此类可实现对下列方案的支持：This class enables support for the following scenarios: - 改变用于每个请求的 HTTP 谓词。Varies the HTTP verb used for each request. - 允许请求设置和查询 HTTP 标头 (key, value) 对。Allows HTTP header (key, value) pairs to be set and queried by request. - 允许为 HTTP 请求指定查询字符串。Allows the query string to be specified for an HTTP request. 此类可由 和相关类使用。This class can be used by and related classes. 对于传入消息，此属性将添加到消息中。For incoming messages, this property is added to messages. 对于传出消息，此属性将造成以下情况发生：For outgoing messages, this property causes the following to happen: - 将 设置为 。 is set to . - 被追加到 。 is appended to the . - 被添加到设置为要传送的 HTTP 标头。 is added to the HTTP headers set to be transmitted. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何在此类的实例中设置若干属性，并将该实例合并到消息中。The following code shows how to set several of the properties in an instance of this class and incorporate the instance into a message. [!code-csharp[S_Pox#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_pox/cs/service.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_Pox#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_pox/vb/service.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化对象的方式如下：This constructor initializes the object as follows: - = `POST`。 = `POST`. - 设置为空字符串。 is set to the empty string. - = `false`。 = `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何不通过显式调用构造函数来从消息实例化此类。The following code shows how to instantiate this class from a message without explicitly calling the constructor. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As WebHeaderCollection
public: property System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ Headers { System::Net::WebHeaderCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从 HTTP 请求获取 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets the HTTP headers from the HTTP request.

value.span: 返回一个 ，其中包含 HTTP 请求中的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Returns a that contains the HTTP headers in the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时此属性不可用，并且尝试访问此属性可能会引发异常。There are situations in which this property is not available and attempts to access it may cause an exception. 这可能会在 HTTP 请求完成，尤其是在消息可用前取回发出的答复的单向方案后，IIS 中承载的 WCF。This can happen when WCF is hosted in IIS, after the HTTP request is complete, especially in one-way scenarios where the reply is sent back before the message has become available. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此属性将自定义标头添加到消息中。The following code shows how to use this property to add custom headers to a message. [!code-csharp[S_Pox#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_pox/cs/service.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_Pox#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_pox/vb/service.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Method { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求的 HTTP 谓词。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP verb for the HTTP request.

value.span: HTTP 请求的 HTTP 谓词。

span.span: The HTTP verb for the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，WCF HTTP 消息使用 POST 谓词。By default, WCF uses the POST verb for HTTP messages. WCF 使用 GET 谓词来访问 ServiceHost 的基址时显示帮助信息。The GET verb is used by WCF to display help information when accessing a ServiceHost's base address. 这可用于检查 WCF 服务处于活动状态时使用 Web 浏览器。This is useful for checking whether a WCF service is active when using a Web browser. 由定义其他方法[HTTP RFC](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96616) PUT、 DELETE、 HEAD、 选项、 跟踪和连接。Other methods defined by the [HTTP RFC](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96616) are PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS, TRACE, and CONNECT. 这些方法在与其他服务进行互操作时有特殊的行为。These methods have special behaviors when interoperating with other services. ## Examples 下面的代码从消息中获取此类的实例，然后根据此属性调度到不同的方法。The following code gets an instance of this class from the message and then dispatches to different methods based on this property. [!code-csharp[PoxSample#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/poxsample/cs/server/messagebasedcustomerservice.cs#0)] [!code-vb[PoxSample#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/poxsample/vb/server/messagebasedcustomerservice.vb#0)]

public: static property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与 类关联的消息属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the message property associated with the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QueryString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求的查询字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the query string for the HTTP request.

value.span: HTTP 请求中的查询字符串。

span.span: The query string from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有很多基于 HTTP 请求查询字符串的已知安全攻击（例如，SQL 注入攻击）。There are many well-known security attacks based on an HTTP request's query string (for example, the SQL injection attack). 请总是严格验证包含在查询字符串中的参数。Always rigorously validate the parameters contained in the query string. 如果不经验证就使用值，那等于开放众所周知的安全漏洞。If you use the values without validation, a well-known security hole is open.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SuppressEntityBody { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否忽略消息正文并且只发送标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the body of the message is ignored and only the headers are sent.

value.span: 如果禁止发送消息正文，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the message body is suppressed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于空消息请求：例如，接受无消息正文的 GET 请求的服务。This property is used for empty message requests: for example, a service that accepts a GET request without a message body. 在这种情况下，生成响应消息的 对象时，请将 属性设置为 `true`。In this case, when building the object for the response message, set the property to `true`. 当与非 WCF 服务进行互操作，务必请注意，某些谓词应包含消息正文根据 HTTP 标准;其中包括 PUT 和 POST。When interoperating with non-WCF services, it is important to note that certain verbs are expected to contain a message body according to the HTTP standard; these include PUT and POST. 而有些谓词应不含消息正文；这些谓词包括 GET 和 HEAD。Other verbs are expected to suppress the message body; these include GET and HEAD. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_Pox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_pox/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_Pox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_pox/vb/service.vb#2)]

summary.span: 创建并返回当前对象的一个副本。

span.span: Creates and returns a copy of the current object.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示当前对象的副本。

span.span: A object that represents a copy of the current object.
